weekly_top_story.headline: U.S. President Trump and Russian President Putin agree to hold a new summit to discuss the Ukraine war
weekly_top_story.summary: After a productive phone call, Trump and Putin committed to meeting in Budapest to address the ongoing conflict in Ukraine, signaling potential diplomatic progress in a major geopolitical crisis.

stories.headline: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy visits White House, urges President Trump for long-range Tomahawk missiles
stories.summary: Zelenskyy met with Trump to request advanced weapons to strike deep into Russian territory, but Trump appeared hesitant, emphasizing hopes to end the war without escalating arms shipments.

stories.headline: U.S. Navy rescues and detains survivors after deadly strike on suspected drug boat in Caribbean
stories.summary: Following a U.S. strike on an alleged drug trafficking vessel, the Navy recovered survivors who are now in custody, highlighting ongoing military efforts to combat narcotics smuggling in international waters.

stories.headline: Federal government unveils major border security plan allocating resources to combat illegal trade
stories.summary: Canada’s Prime Minister announced plans to hire 1,000 new border officers to address smuggling of stolen goods, guns, and drugs, indicating intensified efforts to secure national borders.
